text:
About 500 cusecs of water is being released from Mettur Dam from Tuesday morning for drinking water purpose. The sluices of the dam were closed on February 25, following the completion of the farm activities in the delta districts.

The water level in the Mettur Dam stood at 61.01 feet on Tuesday evening against its full level of 120 feet. The storage level stood at 25.445 tmc. The inflow into the dam was 139 cusecs, PWD sources said.
title: 500 cusecs released from Mettur Dam
